welcomePage.title: Welcome to OpenClovis SAFPlus IDE version 6.0
welcomePage.intro: The SAFplus IDE provides a user friendly integrated development environment for designing a networking system. With an industry standard GUI for managing and building projects the IDE provides customized views, editors and perspectives for designing information.
welcomePage.item: Perspective, Views & Editors SAFplus IDE perspective consists of the Clovis Workspace, Editors and Views.
Clovis Workspace The Clovis Workspace will list all OpenClovis IDE projects. All projects will have "configs", "models" and "src" sub folders.

Configuring Clovis Perspective You can move your views and editors around the Workspace by dragging its title bar. You can also add more views to Clovis Perspective by selecting Window > Show View> Other> Clovis and selecting a view of your preference. You can reset the perspective to its default setting by selecting Window > Reset Perspective.
Learn More About OpenClovis SAFplus IDE To learn more, you can browse through our online help OpenClovis IDE User Guide, or go through the tutorial located in the pane on the right.
